snippet.title: 3D Galax - [Atari ST] Gameplay showing up to wave 14 (1987)
snippet.description:
3D Galax was released for the Atari ST by Gremlin in 1987.
You'll get the whole title music at the beginning of the video... click here 05:42 to skip it (and the loading time) and go directly to gameplay.
This is a kind of 3D version of the arcade game Galaxians. The gameplay is actually too easy (never thought i was gonna say that about an ST game) and gets too repetitive quite fast. I got bored at wave 14 and started to play bad so i could show the game over in the video :-)
The game has 99 waves in total.
Great music by Ben Daglish though and pretty good 3D for an early ST game.

00:00 - Loading time and titlescreen
00:36 - Titlemusic and titlescreen
05:42 - Gameplay
19:59 - Gameplay with music off (SFX only)
24:00 - Gameplay with music back on :)
38:17 - Game Over

*****
Recorded from my Atari ST (1 mb) using Micomsoft RGB capturecard SC-500N1 and Xsync-1, software used is AmarecTV and Virtualdub.
*****
